definitions.definition: sweet food eaten at the end of a meal
definitions.labels: (British English)(especially British English)(British English)(especially North American English)(especially British English)(North American English)

examples.text: the dessert trolley *(= a table on wheels from which you choose your  in a restaurant)*
The waiter asked us if we'd like to order a dessert.
This chestnut pudding is a rich dessert with a festive flavour.
We finished off with a dessert of honey and nuts.

wordOrigin: mid 16th cent.: from French, past participle of desservir ‘clear the table’, from des- (expressing removal) + servir ‘to serve’.
